name: microfrontend-ecommerce
description: Mini ecommerce project with React and Vue.js microfrontends using Fake Store API

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:container && npm run install:products && npm run install:cart && npm run install:auth && npm run install:shared
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:container" "npm run dev:products" "npm run dev:cart" "npm run dev:auth"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:products && npm run build:cart && npm run build:auth && npm run build:container && node scripts/copy-builds.js
